name: redbracket-autocad-plugin
description: RedBracket AutoCAD Plugin for CADMATE 2025 Integration

scripts.build: echo 'Building C# project requires Windows and Visual Studio/MSBuild. See BUILD_INSTRUCTIONS.md for details.'
scripts.build:debug: echo 'Debug build requires Windows and Visual Studio/MSBuild. See BUILD_INSTRUCTIONS.md for details.'
scripts.clean: echo 'Clean requires Windows and Visual Studio/MSBuild. See BUILD_INSTRUCTIONS.md for details.'
scripts.restore: echo 'NuGet restore requires Windows and Visual Studio/MSBuild. See BUILD_INSTRUCTIONS.md for details.'
scripts.dev: echo '===========================================' && echo 'RedBracket AutoCAD Plugin Development Info' && echo '===========================================' && echo '' && echo 'This is a C# AutoCAD/CADMATE plugin project.' && echo '' && echo 'To build this project, you need:' && echo '  - Windows 10 or later (64-bit)' && echo '  - Visual Studio 2019 or later' && echo '  - CADMATE 2025 with GRX SDK' && echo '  - .NET Framework 4.7.2' && echo '' && echo 'Build Instructions:' && echo '  1. Open CADPlugIns.sln in Visual Studio' && echo '  2. Select Release configuration and x64 platform' && echo '  3. Build > Build Solution (F6)' && echo '' && echo 'Output Location:' && echo '  AutocadPlugIn/bin/x64/Release/' && echo '' && echo 'For detailed instructions, see BUILD_INSTRUCTIONS.md' && echo '===========================================' && echo '' && echo 'Keeping dev server running for documentation purposes...' && node -e 'setInterval(() => {}, 1000)'
scripts.install: echo 'No Node.js dependencies required for this C# project.'

author: RedBracket
